Package game_objects.actions

Class Action

  • java.lang.Object
    • game_objects.actions.Action
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    SearchPlanet, Sleep, UseItem
    public abstract class Action
extends java.lang.Object
    An Action is when a crew member clicks on an Action's label. The Action event is performed

      • shouldShowAction

        public abstract boolean shouldShowAction​(java.util.HashSet<java.lang.Integer> blackList)
        Determine if this action should be shown as an option for the crew member to perform
        Parameters:
        blackList - Set containing ints representing which actions cannot be performed
        Returns:
        True or False, should show action or shouldn't show action

      • performAction

        public void performAction​(CrewMember cm)
        Action event being performed. Deselect crew member. Implement this method further in extensions of this class
        Parameters:
        cm - Crew Member performing action.
